page.title: 02Colvend: Arts and Crafts
page.content:
There are two shops in the area which open only in the summer for the benefit of tourists.
One is called "June's Pantry" and sells tweeds,woollen sweaters,scarves and tartan capes.It also has pottery, ceramics and semi-precious stones.If you wish,you can sit down and have tea or coffee and home-made scones.
The other shop is called "The Brae". It sells little gifts of all kinds, honey,jam and pottery.
Very few of the goods sold in the shops are made in the area. Most are bought in from other parts of Scotland.
